articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: M4 Ultra Designed For The Mac Pro Has Been Hinted To Feature Up To An 80-Core GPU, As Apple Said To Be In A Better Position To Enter The Mainstream Gaming Market - Wccftech
articles.description: The latest report talks about the M4 Ultra featuring up to an 80-core GPU when running in the Mac Pro, making it more than capable of playing games
articles.content: Apple is officially done with launching its trio of M4 chipsets, which includes the top-end M4 Max, and it is an exceptional performer. Just recently, it became the fastest CPU in Geekbench 6s single… [+2701 chars]
